topics.body:
As much as I like the internet you know what I hate about something the internet has caused to happen?  How many people on the internet think that internet opinion bloggers are hard scientists.

"3D printers can't make metal objects!  That's a hard scientific fact!  Their uses are limited cause they can't make metal objects!  It will never happen and that's a scientific fact!"
I mean where the fuck do I even begin with something this incredibly fucking retarded?  They've been 3D printing metals for over a year and are working on making jet engines and cars out of 3D printed metals.  I know that 3D printing is slower, but it's more designed towards bringing down costs on expensive items; you'll still have your factories for say plastic cups, but 3D printing say a life size pvc anime figure would cost 1/10th the normal price.

Everyone's entitled to their opinions and such, but don't go "I have a college degree in everything and I know everything!".

I don't ever say fabricated bullshit like "I have a doctorate in physics", cause that would be complete bullshit; I just like physics as a hobby, but my actual college degree is in advertising; if I were to say that I have a college degree in physics that would be complete bullshit.

Eh; just the whole "I have a college degree in everything!" crowd on internet blogs annoys the fuck out of me.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
